title: Amazon API Gateway REST API to AWS Lambda
description: This pattern creates an Application Load Balancer and an AWS Lambda function as target.

introBox.headline: How it works
text: This pattern deploys an Application Load Balancer with an AWS Lambda function written in Rust as target. The function logs the incoming API event and context object to an Amazon CloudWatch Logs log group and returns basic information about the event to the caller.
See the Github repo for detailed testing instructions.
